extendedInfo.description: Finalmente una versione completamente gratuita di uno dei piÃ¹ famosi giochi di carte italiani: La Scopa!Vinci contro l'avversario e diventa il campione di scopa!* APP2SD* Scegli tra 3 tipi di carte italiane* Configura il gioco con il tuo nomeNuovi aggiornamenti in arrivo. Se trovi un errore nel gioco, mandami una email, non inserire un giudizio negativo sul market, proverÃ² a risolvere il problema il prima possibile.

reviews.title: Cheater
reviews.comment: Several times I was beating the computer and game would not allow me to pick up cards. Noticed two times I tried to pick up a six and four with king and the program denied it and kept my king moving on to the next draw. I should have had a scopa and the win.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok, but bit grrat
reviews.comment: Ok, but card pickup is very glitchy. Misses pickups sometimes, to here\'s advantage
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but Buggy
reviews.comment: I enjoy this game, but there are several things that make me want to uninstall it. The directions could be clearer for us newbies. More importantly, it would be great if it didn\'t cheat. I can never pick up a combo with a king, only another king. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, definitely not great
reviews.comment: Like Paul, I have realized this particular version is designed to cheat in order to prevent the player from \"winning\".  Exactly as he described, a king (10) frequently fails to gather the 7 & 3 already on the board.  For the first  time this evening, a non-face card failed to gather a combo of 2 other face cards.  None the less, I love playing Scopa, learned to play from a former USAF that had been stationed in Italy.  Ust wish the developer would fix this glitch & and allow an honest PLAYER win.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GALAXY s3
reviews.comment: Was working perfect on my GALAXY SII, NOW I AM USING GALAXY SIII, IT SUCKS, ONLY 2 STARS FOR NOW
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good, some bugs
reviews.comment: Pretty Good I like this game, but it has some bugs. There was a 7 & 3 on the \"floor\".  I tapped my king & it threw it down. It didnt pick them up.  Please fix!  Also, CPU had 2 cards, 7 of diamonds & 6 of diamonds.  It threw down the 7 of diamonds first.  No person would throw it away. There needs to be some fixes on the games logic please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix please
reviews.comment: I too have noticed the \"cheating\" methods now in the game that the AI will use. I used to win a decent amount of games. Now I never win a game. Please fix, its making the game less enjoyable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works perfectly!
reviews.comment: I didn\'t have any bug with this app. Maybe there are still some things that could be improved (displaying the number of cards remaining, displaying the current score at the bottom), but it works just fine and is fun to play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: Every once in a while I get my cards and one is upside down so I can\'t see what it is.  Also, I know sounds can be annoying but it\'d be nice to have a music option. Something italian of course
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love playing scopa as I\'m Italian but this game is nothing like it.This game is boring ,unfair and I don\'t really like it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing feature
reviews.comment: It misses the feature to choose which cards to pick when there are more options! ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Taken cards should be face down
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Improve table
reviews.comment: OK game, but improve it so your acquired cards don\'t cover the middle card(can\'t tell if card is 6 or 7), also show how many cards remaining. Last deck shuffling doesn\'t look very random.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Non male
reviews.comment: Non male la giocabilita,  manca nella scelta dei mazzi le triestine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I\'m not Italian, but I discovered this game on a trip to Italy. So far it seems very authentic, almost as if I was at the table in Treviso playing with the old dudes who do nothing but shout and scream! Lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I played this on a Nancy drew game and loved it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Too easy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix please
reviews.comment: Keeps restarting when I change screens. Otherwise great game! Please fix. X10 2.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: with online game.and french deck would be perefect :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Just like the original game. English would be nice. So would alternative decks - difficult to distinguish face cards on small screens.
reviews.author: A Google User
